EmailTemplate.name: ACSM Case Owner Assigned Template
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Case.CaseNumber} {!Case.Case_Ref_ID__c} has been assigned to {!Case.OwnerFullName}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Case.Contact},
Your {!Case.CaseNumber} has now been assigned to {!Case.OwnerFullName}.
If you need a more immediate status or have any questions please reply to this email or contact {!Case.OwnerFullName} at Contact: 602-365-6416 / Toll free: 888-377-5375. Please be prepared to reference your case number during the call.
Thank you again for your continued business.
Honeywell Flight Support Services FSSTechSupport@Honeywell.com Contact: 602-365-6416 / Toll free: 888-377-5375 Case Ref ID: {!Case.Case_Ref_ID__c}
